ThingDef.label: PnL cape
PnL militia uniform
ThingDef.description:
A uniform worn by the militia on automata.

This clothing is made with PnL industry's unique technology that combines metal and fabric.

The built-in parts work with the automaton to give it a decent defense.

ThingDef.label: PnL militia goggles
ThingDef.description: A goggles worn by the militia on automata.

ThingDef.label: PnL soldier uniform
ThingDef.description:
This is the uniform worn by the military on automata.

This clothing is made with PnL industry's unique technology that combines metal and fabric.

Built-in parts work in conjunction with the automaton to provide good defense. But it doesn't help in situations other than combat.
